titleStmt.title: The necessity of altering the present oath of allegiance made evident also the declaration signed by above 28000 in Lancashire, when they expected a late French invasion, compared with the association signed in this present Parliament / in a letter to a nobleman.
titleStmt.author: W. A.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end in ms.: 5th March, 1695/6; Wing (2nd ed.) gives date as 1690.
Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
